author: Mano Beridze
content: Friends  I don't know  I think some guys decided to label me as sectarianism and tried to question them about the pandemic. Answers would be interesting. 😑.. 1. Why did Wikipedia change the classical definition of this word shortly after the pandemic started? (I am a witness). 2. Why did Janmo forbid autopsies of the dead when the virus isn't contagious and many doctors were willing to do so? 3. Why did the patients who died with non-Covid have changed their diagnoses? (I personally know the ones who see this). 4. Why did respiratory tracts continue to exist  when many doctors have discovered and proven it's respirators that cause patient death? 5. Why are the so-called psiar tests used to diagnose  when the author of the tests Carrie Mullis claimed the tests were not meant to diagnose? 6. Why do empty ambulance cars run with sirens on Italian streets? 7. Why are there empty hospitals in different countries of the world? 8. Why have millions of patients cancelled and left without medical services  causing so many deaths? 9. Why are there so many complaints in Italian court from family members of the deceased that have not been discussed yet? 500 Italian citizens will categorically demand compensation from the state with 100 million euros in compensation. Also filed a complaint with Strasbourg Court  accompanied by death's medical claims. 10. Why was dissenting on television and only one-sided opinions banned for ten months? 11. If human health and well-being is concerned  why is the media's horrific human-infuriating terror and coffins being shown instead of calming them down? 12. Why do we have masks when many infectious diseases claim that masks boost immunity and are the root cause of infection? Or  if protected  why does the virus spread and pandemics continue? 13. Why Sweden and Belarus have far fewer virus deaths than in countries where regulations are enforced? 14. Why did Janmo forbid the use of medicines that had good effect on patient treatment? 15. Why is it that home-based treatment is effective and does not have fatal consequences  unlike in-hospital treatment? 16. Why vaccinations were necessary when famous infectious disease experts and biologists say  this virus changes its face every season and cannot be vaccinated? 17. Why at least genetically modified and not classic vaccine? 18. Why doesn't any medical organization  including Janmo and the pharmaceutical companies that manufacture these vaccines  take any responsibility for vaccine side effects? 19. Why does vaccination propaganda need to be televised when it's so popular and trusted by the population? 20. Why should a normal human trust a vaccine that was made in 6 months instead of 10 years? 21. Why didn't the virus kill anyone from the so-called elite world? 22. Why is no one allowed  except the authorities  to check the number of dead people and their deeds? P.S. Probably  I missed the questions and if you add them  the picture will be more perfect. It would be nice to hear answers from the opponents. Thank you so much. 🙂

justify: explanation the quote was falsely attributed to ratan tata the industrialist took to twitter and instagram to clarify that he has never said  nor written this
label: FALSE
title: indian industrialist ratan tata says that the countrys economy will bounce back after coronavirus
author: Aasthaoverseas Visnagar
content:
Experts are predicting huge down fall of Economy due to the Corona .
I do not know much about these experts.
But I know for sure that they do not know anything about the value of human motivation and determined efforts. If experts were to be believed  after the total destruction in 2nd World War Japan had NO future. BUT the same Japan in just 3 decades or so  made US cry at the market place. If the experts were to be believed  Israel should have been wiped out from the world map by the Arabs  but the fact is different. As per the rules of Aerodynamics  the Bumble Bee can NOT fly. But it flies  because it does not know the rules of Aerodynamics. If the experts were to be believed  we should have been no where in 83 Cricket World Cup. If the experts were to be believed Wilma Rudolf  the first American lady to win 4 Olympic Gold in Athletics   should not have been in a position to walk without braces  no question of running. If the experts were to be believed Arunima Sinha can hardly lead a normal life. But she climbed the Mount Everest. The corona crisis is no different. I do not have any doubt that  We will defeat the Corona hands down and The Indian Economy will bounce back in a great manner.
- *RATAN TATA*

Corona Virus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) ရောဂါ ကာကွယ်၊ ထိန်းချုပ်၊ ကုသရေးလုပ်ငန်းများ အရှိန်အဟုန်မြင့် ဆောင်ရွက်နိုင်ရေး ညှိနှိုင်းအစည်းအဝေး ပြုလုပ်
======================================================
မတ် ၂၈ ရက် ရန်ကုန်တိုင်းဒေသကြီး အစိုးရအဖွဲ့ ဝန်ကြီးချုပ်ဦးဖြိုးမင်းသိန်းသည် ယနေ့ မွန်းလွဲ ၁ နာရီတွင် တိုင်းဒေသကြီးအစိုးရအဖွဲ့ရုံး၊ ခန်းမ(၁)တွင် Corona Virus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) ရောဂါ ကာကွယ်၊ ထိန်းချုပ်၊ ကုသရေးလုပ်ငန်းများ အရှိန်အဟုန်မြင့် ဆောင်ရွက်နိုင်ရေးအတွက် ညှိနှိုင်းအစည်းအဝေး ပြုလုပ်ခဲ့သည်။ အစည်းအဝေးသို့ လုံခြုံရေးနှင့် နယ်စပ်ရေးရာဝန်ကြီး ဗိုလ်မှူးကြီးအောင်စိုးမိုး၊ စိုက်ပျိုးရေး၊ မွေးမြူရေး၊ သစ်တောနှင့် စွမ်းအင်ဝန်ကြီး ဦးဟံထွန်း၊ လျှပ်စစ်၊ စက်မှု လက်မှုနှင့် လမ်းပန်းဆက်သွယ်ရေးဝန်ကြီး ဒေါ်နီလာကျော်၊ ရန်ကုန်မြို့တော်ဝန် ဦးမောင်မောင်စိုး၊ လူဝင်မှုကြီးကြပ်ရေးနှင့် လူ့စွမ်းအား အရင်းအမြစ်ဝန်ကြီး ဒေါ်မိုးမိုးစုကြည်၊ အစိုးရအဖွဲ့ အတွင်းရေးမှူး ဦးမျိုးအောင်ဌေးနှင့် တိုင်း၊ ခရိုင်အဆင့် ဌာနဆိုင်ရာ တာဝန်ရှိသူများ တက်ရောက်ခဲ့သည်။
YRG Info;

content: Find out the real information in our STAR FACT CHECK! Myth: There's a circulating image that says the right and wrong kind of face shield. label: Misleading
title: sri lanka government has hidden the details of covid19 spread in the country and large number of death bodies have been disposed using body bags
author: Chamal Sanjeewa
content:
The World Health Organization warns that the new corona virus can come back in a second and third round.. Some websites seem to be reporting the facts we mention in distortions without properly being a complete article.. Whenever possible  trust the internationally recognized media or news reported by the first owner's facts..     Even though the government is plagued  Corona all over the country..! Middle roots are also closed..! Many villages in Kandy sealed..! 300 suspected deaths and 500 were burnt in bodybags..! (Sri Lanka e News-2020. May. 02  a. m. 7.40) Even though the government tried to shut down  the corona epidemic is spreading severely across Sri Lanka. Providing the best evidence for that  the Madamulana area of Weeraketiya  which was the village of Rajapakshala  has been completely closed today. The reason for this is that 9 corona infected people were found in that area. In addition to the south's Medamulana  Walasmulla  four-road areas have also been closed. 2 corona infected people have been found in the four road area. The most reason for the closure of the above areas is that the found infected were walking around the village. In addition  Central Province is the most endangered by now. A large number of infections have been found in the Kandy district of Central Province and many villages have been completely closed last night as they have also walked in many places. They are  in the area of Pathahewa sixty
Puliyedda  Nahinawala  Nahinawala North  Katawala  Thalathuoya  Dambawela North  Bawulana  Kandakula  Villages  In Kandy district 
Poojapitiya  Bokkawela  Ambakka  Hirassagala  Ampitiya  Nugawela  Gampola  Nawalapitiya road junction  Akurana  Wattagedara  Madawala (3 infected found)  Ukgahakumbura  Valdeniya  Moragaha hill  Gamhatha  Siyabalapitiya  Pussadeniya  Four Liyadda Pradda The area is the one who is the one who is 117 people from the previous Thalathuoya area have been taken to Punani camp for quarantine and 19 of them have been confirmed corona positive. As there have been a number of infected people from the above areas  the decision has been made to close these areas according to the recommendations made by the public health officials to the police to close these areas. Suspected deaths 500-JJ. Ni. Inspector of Police / Death 300-Zonal Medical Director
-------------------------------
Meanwhile  unofficial reports say that the death toll which was suspected to be Corona and performed as per the Corona asset is much higher than the government says. A senior deputy inspector who couldn't disclose the name he commented on Lanka e News said that  according to his knowledge  more than 500 such deaths have occurred across the country. Meanwhile  Hambantota Zonal Director Dr. Chamal Sanjeewa  is noting on a social network that more than 300 suspected corona deaths have occurred islandwide. Chamal Sanjeewa doctor  who also claims that all the dead bodies were cremated using safe container bags  says he is revealing the truth as per a request made by Dr. Kapila Wickramanayake  the director in charge of the Central Pharmaceutical Store. The stupid government should understand that lies are not a vaccine for any virus. People should be wise not to accept the lies of the government and risk their lives by considering the epidemic as small as possible. - By a staff reporter of Sri Lanka e News -

Britanski dnevni list "Mirror" prenosi slijedeću izjavu visokog državnog predstavnika medicinske vlasti. "Vijest dolazi dok javnost zahtijeva od vlade više odgovora oko toga tko spada u tu kategoriju  s obzirom na uobičajene zdravstvene probleme.

Jonathan Van-Tam  zamjenik glavnog medicinskog ureda za Englesku  rekao je jutros za BBC: "Ne želim ulaziti u ogromne detalje oko svake pojedinačne rizične skupine  ali tvrdimo da su ljudi koji se cjepe protiv gripe  osim djece uklapaju u visoku kategoriju rizika  ljudi za koje se savjetuje vrlo snažna socijalna distanca. " [1][2]

Da cjepivo protiv gripe povećava rizik od zaraze coronavirusom i znanstveno je dokazano. [3][4][5]

Hoćete li vi i dalje vjerovati u sigurnost cjepiva  čekati cjepivo protiv coronavirusa (covid-19) i nastavite se i dalje cjepiti?

Probudi se!
